$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror/mode/ma.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror/mode/markdown/markdown.js

$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-ma.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-markdown/readme
$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-ma.text: This plugin adds Syntax Highlighting for Markdown tiddlers (text/x-markdown) to the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed
